title: Legit feeder troll for no reason in placements (on this account now)
body:
Picked Ashe jungle and said nothing besides trust me when someone asked "Ashe jungle?," I was feeling like maybe he knew what he was doing and it was good for same reason TF jungle worked. Anyway when we get into game he buys no items then goes top and waits for Yi to kill her and says nothing. I then asked him why he did it and he said nothing, so I say I'm reporting him for win trading and he stops to type whilst walking mid with no items still. He typed, "I have wireless mouse and it is on LSD," to everyone in the game it was extremely obvious what he was doing and once he finished typing in all chat he continued walking mid to feed mid and then dc's right afterwards. On my placements too :(.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76598469/200094566?tab=overview

replies.body: He or she obviously didn't try trolling hard enough.  Maybe next time .
hi friend, he is troling so he can vs bronze plebs like u, then %%%% all over you and get back to his true elo.

> [{quoted}](name=DiddlyDonger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PMb6p7Ee,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-23T14:45:22.023+0000)
>
> How did you win??

Fiora and what I am guessing would be nubs on enemy team because everyone is basically noob elo atm thanks to new placement system.
